column5: ....why not just bring one crawler? Nimstug
You would have to pack it in bedding not soil! Something that size might need a passport and outdoors card!
When you say bedding, I'm thinking at least queen size...
You would also have check with your outfitter about the weight limit flying your "bait" in.
I wouldn't attempt to impale that thing on a hook without serious backup, but GAWD can you imagine the size of the fish???
